CustomField.formula: IF( AND( New_Profile_Total__c > 0, New_Tool_Total__c > 0), IF( ( New_Profile_Actual__c + New_Tool_Actual__c ) > 0, ((New_Tool_Total__c + New_Profile_Total__c)-(New_Profile_Actual__c + New_Tool_Actual__c))/(New_Tool_Total__c + New_Profile_Total__c),0),0)
CustomField.label: New Mixed Order Discount %
